__prompts__.assembly_name: Enter the name of the project
__prompts__.api_app_name: Enter the name of the project API
__prompts__.database_name: Enter the name for the database
__prompts__.use_existing_azure_key_vault: Use an existing Azure Key Vault (instead of emulator)?
__prompts__.use_existing_azure_storage: Use an existing Azure Storage account (instead of emulator)?
__prompts__.oauth_api_audience: Enter the OAuth API audience (ex: https://{project_domain}/api/v2/)
__prompts__.oauth_api_client_secret: Enter the OAuth API client secret
__prompts__.oauth_api_client_id: Enter the OAuth API client ID
__prompts__.oauth_swagger_client_id: Enter the OAuth Swagger client ID
__prompts__.oauth_swagger_client_secret: Enter the OAuth Swagger client secret
__prompts__.azure_resource_group: Enter the Azure Resource Group name
__prompts__.azure_application_insights_name: Enter the Azure Application Insights name
__prompts__.azure_application_insights_connection: Enter the Azure Application Insights connection
__prompts__.azure_key_vault_name: Enter the Azure Key Vault name
__prompts__.azure_key_vault_connection: Enter the Azure Key Vault connection string
__prompts__.azure_storage_account_name: Enter the Azure Storage account name
__prompts__.azure_storage_connection: Enter the Azure Storage connection string
__prompts__.azure_storage_blob_name: Enter the Storage blob name (needed for emulator and Azure)
